greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function for A001608, Perrin sequence.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
program: (Scheme) (define (A294878 n) (let loop ((k 1)) (if (>= (A001608 k) n) (if (= (A001608 k) n) 1 0) (loop (+ 1 k)))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 10 2017
